description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of St. Mary's Abbey, Melrose, the monastery of Old Melrose, and the town and parish of Melrose. With numerous illustrations by the author" Author: WADE, James A. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10369.d.8." Page: 203 Place of Publishing: Edinburgh Date of Publishing: 1861 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003825821 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
